short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you play Yahoo Fantasy Hockey you need this

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple browser extension for Yahoo Fantasy Hockey which displays how many games a player has left for the week (until Sunday of the week inclusive) and how many games are on "off-nights". 

You now also have the ability to select custom date ranges directly from the extension's popup
